document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. & Al Dhafer, Hathal M.
document.masterDocTitle: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Mikan, J. C.
bibRefCitation.refString: Mikan, J. C. (1796) Monographia Bombyliorum Bohemiae iconibus illustrata. J. Herrl, Pragae [= Prague], 59 pp.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius cinerascens
Mikan, 1796 : 50
. Type locality: Czech Republic .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: PA: Albania , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belgium , Bosnia-Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Czech Republic , Egypt , France , Germany , Greece (incl. Lesbos), Gruzia , Hungary , Israel , Italy , Macedonia , Moldova , Poland , Romania , Russia , Saudi Arabia , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , Turkey , Ukraine , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Tabuk : 25 km SE of Haql (Haql Gov.).
Dates of collection: March.

bibRefCitation.author: Efflatoun, H. C.
bibRefCitation.refString: Efflatoun, H. C. (1945) A monograph of Egyptian Diptera. Part VI. Family Bombyliidae. Section 1: Subfamily Bombyliidae Homeophthalmae. Bulletin de la Societe Fouad I er d'Entomologie, 29, 1 - 483.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius cinerarius var. elbayensis
Efflatoun, 1945 : 319
. Type locality: Egypt (Gebel Elba).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Eritrea , Kenya , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Sudan , Tanzania .
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : Fayfa (Fayfa Gov.), Muhaiel City (Muhaiel Gov.)
Dates of collection: January.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius fulvescens Wiedemann in
Meigen, 1820 : 205
. Type locality: Portugal .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Albania , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Bosnia- Hercegovina, Bulgaria , China , Croatia , Czech Republic , Egypt , Greece , Gruzia , Hungary , Iran , Iraq , Israel , Italy , Kazakhstan , Macedonia , Malta , Moldova , Poland , Portugal , Romania , Russia , Saudi Arabia , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain , Switzerland , Tajikistan , Tunisia , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , Uzbekistan , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : Behan (Abha Gov.). Haiel: Al-Nefoud, Wadi Ifal (Haiel Gov.).
Dates of collection: March.

bibRefCitation.author: Greathead, D. J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Greathead, D. J. (1967) The Bombyliidae (Diptera) of northern Ethiopia. Journal of Natural History, 1, 195 - 284. https: // doi. org / 10.1080 / 00222936700770211

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius modestus ssp. massauensis
Greathead, 1967 : 209
. Type locality: Eritrea .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Eritrea , Mali , Yemen . PA: Saudi Arabia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Makkah : Breiman (Jeddah Gov.).
Dates of collection: February.

bibRefCitation.author: Loew, H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Loew, H. (1873) Systematische Beschreibung der bekannten europaischen zweiflugeligen Insecten. Von Johann Wilhelm Meigen. Zehnter Theil oder vierter Supplementband. Beschreibungen europaischer Dipteren. Dritter Band. H. W. Schmidt, Halle, 320 pp.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius modestus
Loew, 1873 : 192
. Type locality: Greece (Naxos).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Ethiopia , Sudan , Yemen . OR: Pakistan . PA: Afghanistan , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Cyprus , Egypt , Greece (incl. Naxos), Gruzia , Iran , Italy , Kazakhstan , Macedonia , Russia , Saudi Arabia , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Riyadh : Riyadh City ( Riyadh Gov.).
Dates of collection: April.

Bombylius ( Bombylius ) pallidipilus
Greathead, 1967
( Fig. 5 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius pallidipilus
Greathead, 1967 : 212
. Type locality: Eritrea .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Chad , Eritrea , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Somalia , Yemen . PA: Saudi Arabia .

Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.), Ghabet Raghdan (Al- Baha Gov.), Ghabet Shahba ( Al-Baha Gov.). Al-Sharqiya: Al-Hufuf (Al-Ehsaa). Haiel: Haiel City (Haiel Gov.). Makkah : Usfan (Jeddah Gov.), Al-Mudhaylif, Wadi Fatimah ( Makkah Gov.), Wadi Qanona (Al- Ordiyat). Al-Madina: Badr (Badr Gov.).
Dates of collection: Throughout the year.

bibRefCitation.author: Bezzi, M.
bibRefCitation.refString: Bezzi, M. (1924) The Bombyliidae of the Ethiopian Region. British Museum (Natural History), London, 390 pp.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius modestus var. phaeopterus
Bezzi, 1924 : 4
. Type locality: Ethiopia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Eritrea , Ethiopia , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Yemen .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Qamah (Baljurashi Gov.)
Dates of collection: January.
